Fields

UnloadList

A list of objects to unload when the window is closed. Should be Raylib_cs.Texture2D, Raylib_cs.RenderTexture2D, Raylib_cs.Image or Raylib_cs.Shader

public static List<object> UnloadList

List<object>

Elements

List of all UI elements in the GUI. Should be manipulated via the provided methods.
